summary: A small mod that replaces the suppose family heirloom of the Arentino Family with something more heirloomish.
descriptionHtml:
[line]
[center][color=Red][size=7]Aventus Heirloom[/size][/color][/center]
[line]
[center][color=Black][size=4]by Forzane[/size][/color][/center]

[color=Black][size=3 ]Version :[/size][/color]1.0

[color=Black][size=3] Date :[/size][/color]03/03/2014

[color=Black][size=3]Category :[/size][/color] Texture and Mesh Replacers
[line]

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Black]Description[/color][/size][/center][/u]

[center]Replaces the Arentino Heirloom with a new heirloom ring and makes it a bit more rewarding[/center]

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Black]Detail[/color][/size][/center][/u]

[center]just a Simple Mesh Replacer..and also a price change on the item as well[/center]

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Black]Location[/color][/size][/center][/u]

[center]Received from a certain boy[/center]

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Black]Known Issues and Bugs[/color][/size][/center][/u]

[center]None[/center]

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Black]Incompatibilities[/color][/size][/center][/u]

[center]None that i have noticed so far[center]

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Black]Manual installation[/color][/size][/center][/u]

[center]------------------------------

Manual Instructions

------------------------------



1) Extract the contents of the ZIP folder into your Data folder[center]

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Black]Nexus Mod Manager Installation[/color][/size][/center][/u]

[center]------------------------------

Nexus Mod Manager Instructions

------------------------------



Installing the Mod



1) Extract the contents of the archive to a temporary folder.

2) Copy the extracted archive to [Install Path]SkyrimNMMMods.

3) Start Nexus Mod Manager

4) Click the Create button

5) Click the Add Archive button, navigate to the archive and select it, then click the Yes
button.

6) Click the Create button, wait until it finishes, then click the Ok button.



Activating the Mod



1) Start Nexus Mod Manager

2) Double-click the name of the mod, once installed the mod icon will turn blue.



[center]

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Black]Manual Uninstallation[/color][/size][/u][/center]

[center]------------------------------

Manual Instructions

------------------------------



1) Delete the files/folders associated with the mod your mod.[center]

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Black]Nexus Mod Manager Uninstallation[/color][/size][/u][/center]

[center]------------------------------

Nexus Mod Manager Instructions

------------------------------



1) Start Nexus Mod Manager

2) Double click the mod to deactivate it, once finished the icon will turn green[center]

[line]
